about.pageDescription: Learn about Shababna platform and our vision for building the future of Muslim youth

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Shababna Global Platform - From the heart of Istanbul, we work together to build the future of Muslim youth in the world

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empowering Muslim youth through development programs and inspiring events to build a better future

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading global platform in developing Muslim youth and empowering them to make positive impact in society

president.title: President's Message
president.name: Mahmoud Al-Hasanat
president.greeting: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
president.welcome: Welcome to the official website of Shababna Global Organization, the platform that emerged from the concerns of the Ummah and the hopes of its youth, to turn dreams into reality, awareness into action, and ambition into an extended renaissance.
president.vision: From the very first moment, I believed that youth are the energy of change, and they are the hope upon which nations are built and civilizations are shaped. Hence, it was necessary to establish this independent global youth institution, to gather hearts and minds, and unite energies in a path worthy of a nation that Allah has willed to be a witness to people.
president.mission: At Shababna Global Organization, we seek to build a conscious generation, believing in its message, firm in its values, creative in its giving, and capable of making an impact in its society and Ummah. Our vision is clear: global leadership in youth empowerment. Our mission is firm: preparing committed youth who carry the message of faith, engage in the battle of awareness, and contribute to positive change.
president.commitment: Today, with every young man and woman who believe in the power of ideas, the greatness of belonging, and that reform begins with us, we move forward to provide quality programs in education, media, development, identity, and Islamic issues, to create together a more beautiful tomorrow, a broader future, and a higher Ummah.
president.invitation: So welcome to your home, and welcome to joining a global youth journey that knows no boundaries, its motto: faith, awareness, action, and impact.

ceo.title: CEO's Message
ceo.name: Zakaria Al-Qadi
ceo.message:
We are a generation born in times of challenges, but we were not created to complain... we were born to make a difference.

At Shababna Global Organization, we didn't wait for someone to create our future, we decided to be its creators. We gathered from different countries, with diverse ideas, but with one purpose:
For youth to have a role, a voice, and an impact.

We don't just offer programs, we open doors to opportunities, and create an environment that restores your faith in yourself, connects you to your identity, and places you at the heart of your Ummah's issues.

I dream to see every young person among us carrying their project, building their mark, and walking with steady steps towards positive change.
And from here... from the heart of "Shababna" we say to every young person:
Be the beginning. Don't wait for anyone, the world needs you.

Always your brother

testimonials.title: What Youth Say About Us
testimonials.subtitle: Listen to success stories and impact from our youth around the world
testimonials.content1: Shababna platform completely changed my life. I learned new leadership skills and made friends from all over the world.
testimonials.content2: The development programs helped me develop my technical and leadership skills. I recommend everyone to join.
testimonials.content3: The events and workshops were an amazing experience. I learned a lot about leadership and community impact.
